High Priest Orven:

There are too many monsters wandering on the Plains of Glory.

But why am I surprised? Places of ancient battles are attracting monsters. Shattered lands are a some king of reminder of war horrors and a high price of victory.

But the Plains of Glory is a special place for local people. We cannot allow monsters roaming there.

Please, kill the monsters that are roaming the Plains of Glory. I'm talking about Vanor Silenos, Vanor Silenos Soldier, Vanor Silenos Scout, Vanor Silenos Warrior, Vanor Silenos Shaman, Vanor Silenos Chieftain, Vanor, Mercenary of Glory. You have to destroy 500 monsters in total.
